column7: beloved husband of cathy a. (trischler) pritchard; loving father of joseph e. (kristen) and katelyn m. pritchard; dear grandfather of landon j. pritchard; brother of glen pritchard and wendy crawford; also survived by many nieces and nephews. dale was a lifetime member of kilbuck township volunteer fire company . friends will be received on sunday from 1 until time of services at 3 p. m. at the mc. donald-linn funeral home
column8: inc. 529 california ave. avalon. in lieu of flowers
column9: memorial contributions may be made to the pennsylvania fish and boat commission
